#summary Entity Relationship Diagram for smarTAlloc!

== _Version 1.0_ ==

The basic *ER Model* for smarTAlloc! is ready! The entity-relationship model describes the database used in _smartalloc!_ with all the entities, attributes, relationships, cardinalities used in the relational database. 

Click [http://cse300-group3.googlecode.com/files/ER%20Model.JPG here] for jpg image of the model.
